# 2.0.0-alpha.1 (2020-12-01)

# Bug Fixes

  • bundler-webpack: add assets hash to avoid name conflicts (550584aopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: allow stylus to import css by default (6664b65open in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: always watch .vuepress dir (c2c2fedopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: do not enable devtool in prod mode (b1d821aopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: remove server dest temp directory (91ed5bbopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: use loader options type (f5f2b79open in new window)
  • cli: disable noInfo option (e01cb12open in new window)

# Features

  • bundler-webpack: add SSR constant (6fe1ad6open in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: add @sourceopen in new window alias (9d8cc38open in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: add style pre-processors config (7502682open in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: allow disable prefetch and preload links (2e5eb77open in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: copy files from public dir to dest dir (10848feopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: disable VUE_OPTIONS_API by default (ce5945bopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: extract all css files together (ce0783bopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: migrate to postcss 8 (5694346open in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: migrate webpack related hooks (f5eb159open in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: render locale data (2ae31c1open in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: sync client changes and optimize ssr (9b4a2cdopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: use webpack plugin to optimize dev logs (70c1d64open in new window)

# Performance Improvements

  • bundler-webpack: split vendor chunk and enable runtime chunk (0d1fbfdopen in new window)
  • bundler-webpack: use postcss-csso to minify styles (2cb23ccopen in new window)
